name: PongOut (Quackstir)
description:
Move the mouse left and right to move the paddle. 

Press left mouse button to shoot.

alt + f4 to exit the game

Both the red squares and your bullets can damage your health.

your health is shown at the bottom, each color indicates how much hits it can take.

Programs I used:

bfxr - http://www.bfxr.net/

Pyxel Edit - https://www.pyxeledit.com/

Unity - https://unity3d.com/

Font - http://www.dafont.com/pixeled.font
